com.esri.mo2.util
Interface MessageListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
public interface MessageListener
extends EventListener

An interface for objects requesting to be notified about MessageEvents. A Message Event occurs when any object sends a message to the MessageCentre which subsequently broadcasts the message to interested MessageListeners.

See Also:
MessageEvent, MessageCentre

Method Summary
 void exception(MessageEvent event)
          Invoked whenever an Exception has been signalled to the MessageCentre.
 void message(MessageEvent event)
          Invoked whenever a message has been passed to the MessageCentre.
